choices.C:
The attended process starts in an isolated Windows session.
The user is logged in with the credentials entered from the main session.
choices.D:
The attended process starts in the same Windows session.
The user is logged in automatically with their credentials.
choices.B:
The attended process starts on a remote machine.
The user is prompted with a window to enter credentials.
choices.A:
The attended process starts in an isolated Windows session.
The user is prompted with a window to enter credentials on every run.

questions.question_text:
You have two lists in a workflow:
1. FranceCities which contains city names in France
2. IndiaCities which contains city names in India
In order to show all city names from both lists, which expression should be used as the input to a MessageBox?

choices.A: The activity will use SimulateType in Run mode and in Debug mode.
choices.C: The activity will use SendWindowMessages in Run mode and SimulateType in Debug mode.
choices.B: The activity will use Default in Run mode and in Debug mode.
choices.D: The activity will use Default in Run mode and SimulateType in Debug Mode.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The given answer is correct

choices.C: Changes made to the unversioned files will return to the previous version after being committed and pushed to the remote repository
choices.A: Changes made to the versioned files will return to the previous version before being committed and pushed to the remote repository
choices.B: Changes made to the unversioned files will return to the previous version before being committed and pushed to the remote repository
choices.D: Changes made to the versioned files will return to the previous version after being committed and pushed to the remote repository

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Studio comes with the option to undo changes that have been made to versioned files, before you commit and push them to the remote repository.

questions.question_text:
A developer created a Robotic Enterprise (RE) Framework project in UiPath Studio 2021.10 with the default Config.xlsx settings. A Queue Item is processed and a Business Rule Exception is thrown. In addition, a System Exception is thrown in the SetTransactionStatus.xaml file when attempting to set the transaction status to "Failed".
Based on the scenario, what is the behavior inside the REFramework if the System Exception persists?

choices.B: The job is killed and the Queue Item is Abandoned
choices.C: The Set Transaction Status activity is retried up to 2 times
choices.D: A screenshot will be captured and moves to the next Queue Item
choices.A: The Set Transaction Status activity is not retried
